name: web-search
description: Search the web for current information, news, facts, and real-time data using Brave Search

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web for current information. Use this whenever the user asks for real-time data, today's date/time, news, weather, facts that may change, or anything you cannot answer from training data. Prefer this over saying you don't have access to real-time information.

query.description: Search query (e.g. 'current time Denver Colorado', 'today date', 'latest news headline', 'weather 80202')

count.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 5)

freshness.description: Optional. Prefer recent results: pd (24h), pw (7d), pm (31d), py (year). Omit for general relevance.
